body:
Okay so on all the scrim servers, each map with TNT supplies also includes a ton of dispensers. Do you realise that dispensers will ruin any game and any tournament due to their crazy opness? 

Look up Barf Cannon in youtube for one example, you can also make insane TNT bombs, automatic cannons and pretty much turn everything into a ridiculous TNT fest, please remove them because otherwise we will have a ruined tourney.

title: Dispensers in the tournament??
